column4: anyone bother with antivirus on Ubuntu?  I have AVG on my winXP partition but haven't thought about adding any on Ubuntu
Anti-Virus is optional in the world of *nix.

Knowingly send out infected files to your Windows buddies and listen to the sound of them whining as they hose down their machines.  It's their fault for running Windows especially when they don't update and maintain their AntiVirus software. :)
